JioCloud is an ultimate app for storing and managing all your photos, videos, documents, audio, contacts, and messages in the cloud. With JioCloud, you can effortlessly back up your content and instantly sync it across all your devices. Access your files from any smartphone, website, desktop app like Chromebook, or even your TV using the JioCloud app. 

The JioCloud extension for Chromebook simplifies working with JioCloud files on your Chromebook device. You can easily manage, share, and sync all your files directly from the Chromebook's File Manager. 

Here's what you can do with the JioCloud extension: 

Access your JioCloud files and folders directly from the Chromebook's File Manager. 

Seamlessly open, copy, paste, and do other operations on the files in JioCloud directly from your Chromebook. 

Effortlessly add multiple files or folders to JioCloud by dragging them into the JioCloud folder. By storing your files on JioCloud, you can access them from anywhere. 

We value your feedback and are continuously working to improve your experience. If you have any questions or feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at care.jiocloud@jio.com.
